name: Reader Rabbit and the Fabulous Word Factory [C64]
description:
Join Reader Rabbit and Sam the Lion as they help the colorful characters of Sparkalot restore the missing sparkles to the land and sky! Multiple difficulty levels for each mini-game that can be changed at any time. Full video cutscenes & voice acting throughout the game. Simple controls using the Wii Remote.

Educational mini-games designed to teach basic Preschool skills, letters & sounds, matching attributes, shapes & colors, creative expression, & counting.
